Basic.title: BASIC – “Software Only (Independent)”
Basic.subtitle: Best for: Businesses that want to do everything on their own

Basic.title: Services
Basic.positive: Optional Service Hours Pack can be purchased anytime

Basic.title: Positioning
Basic.text: “Use the platform independently. Add help only when you need it.”

Pro.title: PRO – “Software + Included Service Hours”
Pro.subtitle: Best for: Businesses that want occasional help

Pro.title: What’s Included
list: 3 service hours included per month (Block of 30 mins)

Pro.title: Support:
list: Priority email support with 24–48 business-hours response time
30 mins Phone/Zoom support - 2 calls/month (part of service hours)

Pro.title: How Service Hours Can Be Used
Positioning
Pro.text: “A little expert help included — no long-term commitment.”

Enterprise.title: ENTERPRISE – “Software + Managed Service Hours”
Enterprise.subtitle: Best for: Businesses that want predictable, hands-off support

Enterprise.title: What’s Included
list: 5 service hours included per month (Block of 30 mins)

Enterprise.title: Support:
list: Dedicated email support within 24 business-hours response time
30 mins Phone/Zoom support - 5 calls/month (part of service hours)
